name: Loop Industries, Inc.
description: Loop Industries, Inc. is a technology company focused on sustainable plastic production and recycling. Founded in 2014, Loop aims to address the global plastic waste crisis by pioneering a revolutionary process that converts waste PET plastics into high-quality, virgin-grade PET resin, which can be utilized in the production of new plastic products. The company's proprietary technology enables the recycling of plastic that is typically deemed unrecyclable, thereby significantly reducing reliance on fossil fuels and minimizing environmental impact. Loop's mission is to create a circular economy for plastics, allowing businesses and consumers to benefit from sustainable materials while reducing the carbon footprint associated with traditional plastic production. Loop has partnered with various global brands to integrate its recycled materials into their supply chains, promoting environmental responsibility and sustainable practices within the industry. As a leader in innovative recycling solutions, Loop Industries is committed to transforming the way plastic is produced and consumed, ensuring a cleaner, greener future for generations to come.

faq.answer: Loop Industries is headquartered in Montreal, Quebec, Canada.

faq.answer: Loop Industries offers recycled PET resin, branded as Loop PET.
